alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 20 at 8:07AM MDT until May 20 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County. In Texas, Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: High winds could make driving difficult for motorists driving high profile vehicles such as campers, vans, and tractor trailers. Remember, a High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind is imminent or occurring.
